versionInfo.fileDescription: A setup program that installs OpenGroove, a groupware application
versionInfo.copyright: 2007 - 2008 Alexander Boyd, released under the terms of the BSD license

messages.startupErr: An error occurred while starting OpenGroove Installer. Visit www.opengroove.org/opengroove-error to get assistance.
messages.bundledJreErr: OpenGroove Installer was configured to use a bundled Java Runtime Environment, but it is missing. Visit www.opengroove.org/opengroove-error to get assistance.
messages.jreVersionErr: OpenGroove Installer can't find a Java Runtime Environment, which is needed. Visit www.java.com/download to obtain one, or visit www.opengroove.org/opengroove-error to get assistance.
messages.launcherErr: Your version of Java appears to be corrupted. Visit www.opengroove.org/opengroove-error to get assistance.
messages.instanceAlreadyExistsMsg: OpenGroove Installer is already running. You cannot start OpenGroove Installer multiple times. If you need help, visit www.opengroove.org/opengroove-error for assistance.
